Five (5) SSC credit passes in English 
Language not Literature in English and 
Mathematics and any three (3) subjects 
from the following: 
Economics/Commerce,  
Business Methods,  
Principles of Accounts,  
Literature in English  
Geography

 RAMATPOLY  accepts  ‘O’  level  pass  in  
Mathematics.  
PLS-POLY - five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language and any two (2) from CRS/IS,  
 Economics/Commerce,  Geography,  
Government/History, Biology and Health Science 
KAN-POLY accepts Certificate in Social Welfare 
or Community Development of KAN -POLY plus 
five (5) relevant credit passes in Mathematics, 
English Language, Economics, Accounts, 
Government/History, Biology, Agri cultural 
Science, Geography, Commerce.  
CABSP accepts Certificate Course of the College 
or from any recognised institution OR any other 
qualification recognized by the College Academic 
Board.  
SHEHU IDRIS accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Home Management/Home Economics and  
Religious Studies.  
   f)  RUGIPO also accepts three (3) ‘O’ level credit 
passes from Civic Education, Tourism, Office 
Practice, Information and Communication 
Technology, Data Processing, Basic Electricity, 
Islamic Studies, Christian Religious Studies and 
Health Science.  
MASS COMMUNICATION  
  
AAP  
AKPOLY  
 ATAPOLY         
 AUCHIPOLY      
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English 
Language and Mathematics and any 
three (3) other subjects from:  
History,  
Literature in English,  
Economics/Commerce,  
Fine Arts,  
Government,  
Any three (3) subjects 
from Arts/Social  
Science/Physical 
Science.  
  
a)  
b)  
c)  
NIJ, IBD -POLY and OSUNPOLY require credit 
pass in Mathematics.  
NIJ, FEDPO-OKO and MAPA require five (5) ‘O’ 
level credit passes at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
IMT-ENU accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in any of 
Chemistry, Physics, Biology, or Mathematics as 
one (1) of the credit requirements.
